#Text=Götze to make Dortmund return , Schürrle completes Dortmund offensive lineup
#Text=Sunday , July 24 , 2016

#Text=On Thursday , German football club Borussia Dortmund ( BVB ) announced Mario Götze would rejoin the club from their arch rivals Bayern Munich after obligatory medical tests ; Götze is to sign a four-year contract .
#Text=On Friday , BVB announced signing André Schürrle from VfL Wolfsburg .
#Text=File photo of Mario Götze , 2011 .
#Text=Image : Steindy .
#Text=Götze to rejoin his boyhood club
#Text=2014 FIFA World Cup winning goal scorer
#Text=Götze has spent twelve years with Borussia Dortmund , joining the youth ranks in 2001 .
#Text=The 24-year-old midfielder has scored 44 goals in 156 Bundesliga appearances ; 22 goals for each club .
#Text=In three seasons with Bayern , Götze won three Bundesliga titles , two DFB-Pokal titles , and a UEFA Super Cup .
#Text=With Dortmund , he won two League titles and a DFB Cup .
#Text=Making his international debut in November 2010 , Götze has played 56 matches and scored seventeen goals .
#Text=As both the clubs reached the agreement , Borussia Dortmund 's CEO Hans-Joachim Watzke said , " Personally , I 'm absolutely delighted that Mario has chosen to come back to Borussia Dortmund .

#Text=Götze said ,  If I am now to return to my hometown club , then I want to try to win everyone over – especially those who do not welcome me back with open arms – with my performances . "

column1: #Text=( ( de))German language : ‍Wenn ich nun in meine Heimat zurückkehre , möchte ich versuchen , alle Menschen – gerade auch die , die mich nicht mit offenen Armen empfangen – durch Leistung zu überzeugen .
#Text=Götze would potentially play against Bayern in the DFL-Supercup next month .
#Text=File photo of André Schürrle , 2011 .
#Text=Image : Steindy .
#Text=Schürrle to play for fourth Bundesliga club of his career
#Text=Wolfsburg signed now-25-year-old André Schürrle from Chelsea F.C. in February 2015 .
#Text=Having also played for other two German clubs , Mainz 05 and Bayer Leverkusen , Schürrle has scored 48 goals in 174 Bundesliga appearances , and provided 29 assists .
#Text=Schürrle has scored 20 goals for Germany in 55 appearances .

#Text=Borussia Dortmund 's sporting director Michael Zorc said , " André Schürrle is a Germany international with outstanding attacking potential who is also a very good passer of the ball and consistently contributes neatly to his team 's defensive play . "
#Text=( ( de))German language :
#Text=‍André Schürrle ist ein deutscher Nationalspieler mit herausragendem Offensivpotenzial , der zudem sehr passsicher ist und sich auch in der Defensivarbeit immer wieder geschickt einbringt .
#Text=Schürrle had three years left in his contact with the Wolves , now signing for a five-year contract with BVB .
#Text=The clubs did not disclose the transfer sum .
#Text=Dortmund 's sporting director added , " Our offensive lineup is now complete . "
#Text=( ( de))German language : ‍Damit ist unsere Offensive komplettiert .
